SimulationComponent.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'angio, arches, burger, ice, impm, mpm, mpmarches, mpmf, mpmice, poisson1, poisson2, poisson3, rigidmpmice, rmpmice, smpm, smpmice, switcher, wave, solvertest'

subcomponent.attribute1: type OPTIONAL STRING 'angio, arches, burger, ice, impm, mpm, mpmarches, mpmf, mpmice, poisson1, poisson2, poisson3, rigidmpmice, smpmice, smpm, switcher, wave'

debug.attribute1: label REQUIRED STRING 'switchTestConservation_abc, switchDebug_Initialize, switchDebug_equil_press, switchDebug_PressDiffRF, switchDebug_vel_FC, switchDebug_Temp_FC, switchDebug_Exchange_FC, switchDebug_explicit_press, switchDebug_setupMatrix, switchDebug_setupRHS, switchDebug_updatePressure, switchDebug_computeDelP, switchDebug_PressFC, switchDebug_LagrangianValues, switchDebug_LagrangianSpecificVol, switchDebug_LagrangianTransportedVars, switchDebug_MomentumExchange_CC, switchDebug_Source_Sink, switchDebug_advance_advect, switchDebug_conserved_primitive, switchDebug_AMR_refine, switchDebug_AMR_refineInterface, switchDebug_AMR_coarsen, switchDebug_AMR_reflux, switchDebug_InterpolateNCToCC_0, switchDebug_InterpolateCCToNC, switchDebug_InterpolatePAndGradP'

Face.attribute1: annulus OPTIONAL STRING 'x-, x+, y-, y+, z-, z+'
Face.attribute2: circle OPTIONAL STRING 'x-, x+, y-, y+, z-, z+'
Face.attribute6: side OPTIONAL STRING 'x-, x+, y-, y+, z-, z+'
Face.attribute8: rectangle OPTIONAL STRING 'x-, x+, y-, y+, z-, z+'

BCType.attribute2: var REQUIRED STRING 'Neumann, Dirichlet, symmetry, LODI, computeFromDensity, Sine, creep, slip Custom'
BCType.attribute3: label REQUIRED STRING 'cumulativeEnergyReleased, Density, Phi, Pressure, scalar-f, SpecificVol, Symmetric, Temperature, Velocity'

norm.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'LInfinity linfinity L1 l1 L2 l2'

solver.spec: REQUIRED STRING 'smg, SMG, PFMG, pfmg, SparseMSG, sparsemsg, CG, cg, Hybrid, hybrid, GMRES, gmres amg'

independent_variable.attribute1: active OPTIONAL STRING 'yes, true, no, false'

property_model.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'radcoef, patchmean, wsggm, fssk, fsck'

extract.attribute2: mode REQUIRED STRING 'interior, surface, incident, net, velocity'

erosion.attribute1: algorithm REQUIRED STRING 'none, KeepStress, ZeroStress RemoveMass'

type.spec: REQUIRED STRING 'null, single_velocity, rigid, specified, friction, approach'

constitutive_model.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'comp_mooney_rivlin, comp_neo_hook, comp_neo_hook_plastic, elastic_plastic, hypo_elastic, hypoelastic_plastic, ideal_gas, membrane, mw_visco_elastic, rigid, shell_CNH, small_strain_plastic, trans_iso_hyper, visco_plastic, visco_scram, visco_trans_iso_hyper, water, kayenta, cnh_mms cnh_damage '

plasticity_model.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'isotropic_hardening, johnson_cook, mts_model, preston_tonks_wallace, steinberg_cochran_guinan, zerilli_armstrong'

shear_modulus_model.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'constant_shear, mts_shear, np_shear, ptw_shear, scg_shear'

stability_check.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'acoustic, becker, drucker, drucker_becker, none'

EOS.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'ideal_gas, hard_sphere_gas, TST, Thomsen_Hartka_water, JWL, JWLC, Murnahan, Gruneisen'

Model.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'SimpleRxn, AdiabaticTable, Gruneisen, hard_sphere_gas, IandG, JWL, JWLC, JWLpp, LightTime, Radiation, Simple_Burn, Steady_Burn, Test, Unsteady_Burn, mass_momentum_energy_src, Murnahan PassiveScalar Thomsen_Hartka_water Tillotson, flameSheet_rxn'

rho0.need_applies_to: type Gruneisen JWL JWLC JWLpp Murnahan Tillotson

derivedValue.attribute1: name REQUIRED STRING 'heat_capac_Cv, gamma, reference_heat_capac_Cp, reference_mixture_molecular_weight, reference_heat_capac_Cv, reference_gamma'

Solver.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'CGSolver, direct, hypre, hypreamr'

norm.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'LInfinity linfinity L1 l1 L2 l2'

solver.spec: REQUIRED STRING 'smg, SMG, PFMG, pfmg, SparseMSG, sparsemsg, CG, cg, Hybrid, hybrid, GMRES, gmres amg'
